mapper.select: SELECT * from with_view where `close` = 0 and del = 0 and deadline >= CURDATE() group by id order by deadline limit 10
mapper.insert: insert into `with`( title, content, deadline, member_id, period_id, category_id, way_id, contact_id, link) values ( #{title}, #{content}, #{deadline}, #{memberId}, #{periodId}, #{categoryId}, #{wayId}, #{contactId}, #{link} )
mapper.update: update `with` set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, deadline=#{deadline}, period_id=#{periodId}, category_id=#{categoryId}, way_id=#{wayId}, contact_id=#{contactId}, link=#{link} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from `with` WHERE id = (select MAX(id) from `with`)
update `with` set hit = hit + 1 where id = #{id}
